Articles.Content:
So, I took Jeb into a lander and landed on the MÃƒÂ¼n. This got weird after that mostly because sleep deprivation. Of course the first thing you should always do is plant your flag!

Jeb took a nap in the lander to ease his nerves after the landing, when he woke up he was greeted by a beautiful Sunset over Kerbin.

Before he ran out of daylight, Jeb EVA'd over to a fairly large rock...for science.

Day One:

Jebediah awakens and decides that he will encompass Kerbin. I didn't have the heart to tell him that he's about two million kilometers away.

It was time to explore! Jeb picked a direction and flew off towards it...Gracefully...

...Yeah maybe not so graceful.

Quickly coming to the conclusion that the way he chose was cursed, he went the opposite direction! On his satellite map he saw an interesting looking trench about 10 kilometers from base and decided to refuel his pack and head off. On the way he passed over a shallow ditch. how fascinating.

Do y'all see that? Right above Jeb's helmet is the second moon of Kerbin; Minmus! or a speck of dirt on the lens.

And finally, Jeb realized just as he about made it to the edge of the trench, he was almost out of EVA fuel. Uh, oh. Jeb flew as close to base as he could (0.2 Km from where he was standing:huh:) and had to walk the remaining distance...And i decided that I wasn't going to deal with that so I took a break.

More soon!
